<ashigaru1@...> writes:
> Any thoughts on shinsakudo?

I'm in the school that thinks that some of the things being made rivals
the great works of the great smiths of old. There are some truly nice
things out there. Ron Polansky has one on his site that I keep
considering buying. Gorgeous sword by a Mukansa smith.

- darcy
